channel.title: How do i add custom items 525
channel.description:
I was trying to add chaotic weapons to my 525 but the client kept crashing when i attacked ppl with the weapons, im not sure what stuff i need to copy etc
If someone could make a guide i'd be really gratefull.
Thanks.
